name: MM Apps from manifest are not shown in marketplace when App plugin is disabled

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Setup:
1. Ensure an AWS lambda app such as Service Now has been provided and note the version
2. Locate a test server that has access to the S3 bucket for AWS
3. Ensure you can modify the proxy plugin and compile it locally

customFields.Important notes about this step: None of this should be needed once the apps are in production

inline.description:
1. Ensure the plugin manifest has a record for the app you're targeting ex "com.mattermost.servicenow": "0.1.7"
2. Build the plugin and deploy it
3. Type /apps list and ensure your plugin is visible
4. Open the marketplace
inline.expectedResult: On 4. The target app is listed in the marketplace

inline.description:
1. Open the system console and disable the Apps plugin
2. Open the marketplace again
inline.expectedResult: The target app is n longer visible
